verses.name: Genesis 10:1
verses.text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

verses.name: Genesis 10:2
verses.text: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

verses.name: Genesis 10:3
verses.text: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

verses.name: Genesis 10:4
verses.text: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

verses.name: Genesis 10:5
verses.text: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.

verses.name: Genesis 10:6
verses.text: And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.
